name: Pickle Runner Joe
description:
This game was made for the Finally Finish Something 2022 and is the first game I developed myself :D

Controls :

Click Or Tap To Jump

Esc Will Go To Previous Menu Or Close Game On Homescreen

Summary: 

Pickle Runner Joe is an infinite runner where you just run and jump until you lose.

Created With

Construct 3

CraftPix For The Sprites
